channel.title: Etc on tanaike
channel.description: Recent content in Etc on tanaike

item.title: google.script.run and jQuery.Deferred
item.description: google.script.run doesn’t return values. So I tried this using jQuery.Deferred. GAS : Code.gs function doGet() { return HtmlService.createHtmlOutputFromFile('index') .setSandboxMode(HtmlService.SandboxMode.IFRAME); } function getValues(e) { return e + "hoge"; } HTML : index.html <script src="https://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/1.12.4/jquery.js"></script> <body> <input type="button" id="button" value="ok"> <div id="result"></div> <script> $(() => { $("#button").click(() => { var str = "fuga"; googleScriptRun(str).then((res) => { $('#result').text(res); }); }); }); function googleScriptRun(str) { var d = new $.Deferred(); google.script.run.withSuccessHandler((res) => {d.

item.title: Netatmo API Had Been Down 3
item.description: Report Netatmo API had been down from Aug. 10, 2017 19:30 JST to Aug. 11, 2017 19:00 JST. Now it’s working.

item.title: Netatmo API Had Been Down 2
item.description: Report Netatmo API had been down from Aug. 8, 2017 21:30 JST to Aug. 9, 2017 17:30 JST. Now it’s working. I got an e-mail from Netatmo. They say that the issue was solved.

item.title: Netatmo API Had Been Down 1
item.description: Report Netatmo API had been down from Aug. 7, 2017 00:00 a.m. JST to Aug. 7, 2017 07:30 a.m. JST. Now it’s working.

item.title: CoffeeScript
item.description: I may be slow a bit, but I could notice much convenience of CoffeeScript just now. I didn’t know that scripts of GAS can be made by CoffeeScript up until now. This will have me work more effectively! :D

item.title: 1stpost
item.description: This is a first post. Today this blog was launched. I would like to introduce some of my experimental results. I’m Japanese. So I’ll use both English and Japanese here. Thank you.
